name: Cross Country (mapleglaze)
description:
Move the horse rider to the hotel while avoiding hazards, such as forests, mountains, and rivers. The numbers to the side of the map indicate the number of hazards in the row/column, similar to Picross: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nonogram

This is my entry for GBJam 7. It was made in 1 week

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Advance Text: Z, X, Space, or Enter

Tools Used:

  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Image Editor: Aseprite
  • Font: Petite PX
